intro: Edraianthus pulevicii, commonly known as the Pulevicii's edraianthus, is a rare and striking flowering plant native to the mountainous regions of southeastern Europe. It belongs to the Campanulaceae family and is characterized by its showy, bell-shaped flowers that range in color from white to purple.
